translations: v.打盹，打瞌睡；上下晃动；（足球中）顶（球）；一时疏忽；点头，点头示意
n.点头，点头同意；被选中，得到许可；打盹；摆动

sentences.sentence: Don't let yon dog nod off.
I hope he'll give the nod to the plan.
sentences.translation: 我希望他会同意这个计划。

sentences.sentence: She could only nod, because her mouth was full.
sentences.translation: 她只能点点头，因为她口里塞满了东西。
